name: Renownchemy
description:
Play as Purple, a young girl who must complete all of the potions from her alchemy book to defeat Lady Slugsworth and retrieve her Grandpa's hat. 

**WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU EXPAND THE GAME OUT TO FULL SCREEN**

Controls: 

WASD to Move

left-click spellbook to craft, left-click doors to use.

Left Arrow -or- E key: Dash

Up Arrow -or- W key: DoubleJump/UpAttack

Down Arrow -or- S key: Normal Attack

Credits:

Hannah Wiser - gunter#9431 -- UI/UX Programming + Art / level design

SharkusMK#1140 - Character sprites / art / level building / programming

Minibot Co.#5060 - Sound design

Glowbones#4987 - Art

Cozmik#9425 - Art

Special thanks to Runic_Raccoon (Bdo)#0539 for creating Sir Croakington in all his froggy glory, and Pseudokuno#9076 for playtesting this for us!
